item.title: By: lievenlb
item.dc:creator: lievenlb
item.description: @Devendra : Kulkarni tells you everything you need to know about modular dessins (that is, permutation representations of the modular group). Manin&Marcolli aim for all dessins (permutation reps of the free group on two generators or of $C_{\infty} \ast C_2$ for 'clean' dessins). At the moment there's too much confusion on what M&M really want/need that we'd probably have to await a better version of their paper.
item.content:encoded: @Devendra : Kulkarni tells you everything you need to know about modular dessins (that is, permutation representations of the modular group). Manin&Marcolli aim for all dessins (permutation reps of the free group on two generators or of $C_{\infty} \ast C_2$ for ‘clean’ dessins). At the moment there’s too much confusion on what M&M really want/need that we’d probably have to await a better version of their paper.

item.title: By: Devendra
item.dc:creator: Devendra
item.description: Do you intend to mean that Kulkarni’s paper and its methods could also have any implication for Manin & Marcolli arxiv preprint, you mentioned in the very start of your post?
item.content:encoded: Do you intend to mean that Kulkarni’s paper and its methods could also have any implication for Manin & Marcolli arxiv preprint, you mentioned in the very start of your post?
